name: Cut Cat
description:
A game where you cut and slice through the ground to make your enemies fall down. it includes 40 levels and a final boss.

Controls:

     -"WASD" to move around

     -arrow keys to cut

     "R" for restart

     -use gamepad controls for best experience 

(beware of a few glithces )

See my other work at https://www.instagram.com/zattdott/
